mapper.select: select * from notice order by n_time desc limit 0,1

select products.id, products.name, products.imgurl, SUM(orderitem.buynum)totalsalnum from orders, products, orderitem where orders.paystate = 1 and orderitem.order_id = orders.id and products.id = orderitem.product_id and orders.ordertime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) group by products.id order by totalsalnum desc limit 0,2
